meaning: everyone needs to help with a task
to improve relationships between people or groups

phrase: Get along like a house on fire
meaning: to become friends quickly and get along very well
to work together to achieve something
to work as a team to achieve something
someone who works well with others in a team

phrase: Two heads are better than one
meaning: it's better to work with someone else than alone

phrase: United we stand, divided we fall
meaning: we are stronger when we work together
